mapper.select: select tb_order.id, pr_id, o_num, o_total, c_id, o_status, o_create, o_pay, o_deliver, o_confirm, o_address, o_phone,p_id, pr_image, pr_color, pr_size, pr_material, pr_store, pr_innum, pr_inprice, pr_outprice, p_name, p_type, p_intro from tb_order left join tb_property on tb_order.pr_id = tb_property.id left join tb_product on tb_property.p_id = tb_product.id where tb_order.id= #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ;

select tb_order.id, pr_id, o_num, o_total, c_id, o_status, o_create, o_pay, o_deliver, o_confirm, o_address, o_phone,p_id, pr_image, pr_color, pr_size, pr_material, pr_store, pr_innum, pr_inprice, pr_outprice, p_name, p_type, p_intro from tb_order left join tb_property on tb_order.pr_id = tb_property.id left join tb_product on tb_property.p_id = tb_product.id where tb_order.c_id = #{c_id,jdbcType=INTEGER};

select tb_order.id, pr_id, o_num, o_total, c_id, o_status, o_create, o_pay, o_deliver, o_confirm, o_address, o_phone,p_id, pr_image, pr_color, pr_size, pr_material, pr_store, pr_innum, pr_inprice, pr_outprice, p_name, p_type, p_intro from tb_order left join tb_property on tb_order.pr_id = tb_property.id left join tb_product on tb_property.p_id = tb_product.id where tb_order.c_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and o_status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} ;
mapper.sql: id, pr_id, o_num, o_total, c_id, o_status, o_create, o_pay, o_deliver, o_confirm, o_address, o_phone
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_order
id,
pr_id,
o_num,
o_total,
c_id,
o_status,
o_create,
o_pay,
o_deliver,
o_confirm,
o_address,
o_phone,

mapper.update:
update tb_order
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pr_id = #{record.prId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
o_num = #{record.oNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
o_total = #{record.oTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_id = #{record.cId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
o_status = #{record.oStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
o_create = #{record.oCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
o_pay = #{record.oPay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
o_deliver = #{record.oDeliver,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
o_confirm = #{record.oConfirm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
o_address = #{record.oAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
o_phone = #{record.oPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_order set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pr_id = #{record.prId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_num = #{record.oNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_total = #{record.oTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_id = #{record.cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_status = #{record.oStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_create = #{record.oCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_pay = #{record.oPay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_deliver = #{record.oDeliver,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_confirm = #{record.oConfirm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_address = #{record.oAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_phone = #{record.oPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_order
pr_id = #{prId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
o_num = #{oNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
o_total = #{oTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
o_status = #{oStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
o_create = #{oCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
o_pay = #{oPay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
o_deliver = #{oDeliver,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
o_confirm = #{oConfirm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
o_address = #{oAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
o_phone = #{oPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_order set pr_id = #{prId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_num = #{oNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_total = #{oTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_status = #{oStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_create = #{oCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_pay = #{oPay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_deliver = #{oDeliver,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_confirm = #{oConfirm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_address = #{oAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_phone = #{oPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
